summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding an AML (Anti-Money Laundering) alert related to Richard D. Kahn. The email discusses the clearance of alerts generated for Kahn, who is identified as a signatory and director at Southern Trust Company Inc. The correspondence includes references to previous approvals and requests for updated clearance.

persons.name: Vijay-A Sawant
persons.context: Vijay-A Sawant is seeking updated approval for an AML alert related to Richard D. Kahn.

persons.name: Carl Timcke
persons.context: Carl Timcke communicates the clearance of the AML alert for Richard D. Kahn and provides previous clearance documentation.

persons.name: Richard D Kahn
persons.context: Richard D. Kahn is the subject of the AML alert and is identified as a signatory and director at Southern Trust Company Inc.

persons.name: Bradley Gillin
persons.context: Bradley Gillin is copied on the email regarding the AML alert for Richard D. Kahn.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is also copied on the email regarding the AML alert for Richard D. Kahn.

connections.description: Vijay-A Sawant and Carl Timcke are both involved in the AML compliance process at Deutsche Bank.
Richard D. Kahn is a client of Deutsche Bank, and Carl Timcke is involved in the compliance review related to him.
Vijay-A Sawant is involved in the KYC process for Richard D. Kahn, who is a client of Deutsche Bank.

events.title: RDC Alert for Richard D Kahn
events.description: An RDC alert was generated for Richard D. Kahn, prompting a review by AML Compliance.

events.title: Previous Clearance on Richard D Kahn
events.description: AML Compliance previously reviewed and cleared the subject matter of the alert for Richard D. Kahn.

locations: Deutsche Bank Group Wealth Management, Mumbai, India
keyFacts: Richard D. Kahn is a signatory and director at Southern Trust Company Inc. and a 50% owner of Prytanee, LLC.
An AML alert was generated for Richard D. Kahn on May 30, 2018.
Carl Timcke confirmed the clearance of the alert for Richard D. Kahn, referencing a previous clearance from November 11, 2013.
Vijay-A Sawant is involved in the KYC process for Richard D. Kahn.
The document includes multiple attachments related to the AML alert and previous clearances.
